resources.string: Use Google Hangouts or Mail me directly to get a hold of me. Il get back to you asap!

Connect with 1 of 2 or even both of our communites on Facebook or Google Plus! Get insider information on new projects, sneak peaks and get free stuff from promotional give aways!

This is the Fire Bird Designs app. Simply click on an item that interest you and read the information available. The links are directly tied with Google Play listings. All promotions and sales are also announced in the listings!
